name: Dont Lose Touch!
description:
Weary and confused, you wake up in a strange place you have never seen before. You have fallen out of reality and into......The Backrooms! The only way out is to reassemble your Soul, but be cautious, something is lurking and hunting you. Watch your step and avoid th- @#$*(%$&

*Known Bug is Lose Game screen appears randomly if player is near walls whenmonster is close

*Retry Button does not work
